participant_1.name: Mia
participant_1.personality: Creative and expressive, Mia enjoys arts and music. She's passionate about chocolate and has a playful side.
participant_1.background: i love chocolate bars. i play the violin and the guitar. i speak chinese. my father is an electrician. i play ping pong.

participant_2.name: Larry
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and sociable, Larry thrives in the kitchen and enjoys sharing his culinary creations. He has a love for storytelling through comic books.
participant_2.background: if i'm not cooking in the kitchen then i'm definitely on the water. l also love comic books. i love cooking but i also enjoy fishing. hey my name is larry and i am a chef. spiderman is my favorite.
